workouts.name: Planks
workouts.description: Get ready to strengthen your core with this intense plank workout. Planks are an effective exercise for building core stability and endurance. Follow along and challenge yourself with this session!
instructions: Get into a push-up position on the floor.
Bend your elbows 90 degrees and rest your weight on your forearms.
Your elbows should be directly beneath your shoulders, and your body should form a straight line from your head to your feet.
Hold the position for as long as possible.
Remember to breathe.

workouts.name: Bicycle Crunches
workouts.description: Get ready to engage your entire core with this dynamic bicycle crunch workout. Bicycle crunches are a powerhouse exercise that targets the upper and lower abdominals, obliques, and hip flexors. Follow along with this session to sculpt a strong and defined midsection!
instructions: Lie on your back with your hands behind your head.
Lift your legs off the ground and bend your knees to a 90-degree angle.
Bring your right elbow towards your left knee while straightening your right leg.
Switch sides, bringing your left elbow towards your right knee while straightening your left leg.
Continue alternating sides in a pedaling motion.

workouts.name: Leg Raises
workouts.description: Get ready to sculpt and strengthen your lower abs with this intense leg raise workout. Leg raises are a fantastic exercise for targeting the lower abdominal muscles and improving core stability. Follow this session for a quick and effective lower ab burn!
instructions: Lie on your back with your legs straight and your arms by your sides.
Lift your legs off the ground until they are perpendicular to the floor.
Slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Keep your core engaged and your lower back pressed into the floor throughout the movement.
Repeat for the specified duration.

workouts.name: Hammer Press
workouts.description: The hammer press is typically performed on a chest press machine or using dumbbells. It targets the muscles of the chest, shoulders, and triceps.
instructions: Sit on the chest press machine with your back flat against the backrest.
Grasp the handles with a neutral grip (palms facing each other).
Press the handles forward until your arms are fully extended.
Slowly return to the starting position.
Repeat for the specified duration.

workouts.name: Incline Bench Press
workouts.description: Get ready to engage your upper chest with this incline bench press workout.The incline bench press is a variation of the traditional bench press exercise that primarily targets the upper portion of the chest muscles,
instructions: Lie on an incline bench with your feet flat on the floor.
Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Lower the barbell to your chest, keeping your elbows at a 45-degree angle.
Press the barbell back up to the starting position.
Repeat for the specified duration.

workouts.name: Push ups
workouts.description: Push-ups are a classic bodyweight exercise that target the chest, shoulders, triceps, and core muscles.
instructions: Get into a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the ground.
Push through your palms to return to the starting position.
Keep your core engaged and your body in a straight line throughout the movement.
Repeat for the specified duration.

workouts.name: Hammer Curls
workouts.description: Hammer curls are an effective arm exercise that primarily targets the biceps brachii, brachialis, and brachioradialis muscles.
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and a dumbbell in each hand.
Hold the dumbbells with a neutral grip (palms facing each other).
Curl the dumbbells towards your shoulders, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Repeat for the specified duration.

workouts.name: Push ups
workouts.description: Push-ups are a classic bodyweight exercise that target the chest, shoulders, triceps, and core muscles.
instructions: Get into a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the ground.
Push through your palms to return to the starting position.
Keep your core engaged and your body in a straight line throughout the movement.
Repeat for the specified duration.

workouts.name: Biceps curls
workouts.description: Get ready to sculpt and strengthen your biceps with this intense biceps curl workout.Biceps curls with rings or a bar are effective exercises for targeting the biceps muscles.
instructions: Lie on your back with your legs straight and your arms by your sides.
Lift your legs off the ground until they are perpendicular to the floor.
Slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Keep your core engaged and your lower back pressed into the floor throughout the movement.
Repeat for the specified duration.
